content:
I think I wish I had taken more time for myself during that period to relax and unwind. I felt like I was so focused on resolving the issue with my sister that I neglected my own needs. I also wish I had talked to someone about how I was feeling, whether it was a friend, family member, or even a professional. 

In terms of patterns or triggers, I think uncertainty and a fear of confrontation are definitely things that contribute to my anxiety. I also tend to worry a lot about what others think of me, which can be a source of stress. 

As for self-care practices, I've recently started taking long walks in the park on weekends, which has been really helpful in clearing my mind and feeling more grounded. I've also been reading more, especially books on mental health and wellness. One book that has had a significant impact on me is "The Power of Now" by Eckhart Tolle. It's helped me shift my focus from worries about the future to
